title: Minor typos in FAQ
description:
Minor typos. None make the FAQ unreadable. All have obvious corrections.

4. "official home site at is" s/b "official home site is at",
and "For security reason," s/b "For security reasons,"

5. "If you follows closely" s/b "If you closely follow"

8. "felxible" s/b "flexible"
and "allows to" s/b "allows one to"

14. "complying and JVM" s/b "compliant JVM"
and "system need" s/b "system needs"

16. "teh" s/b "the"
and "docuemtns" s/b "documents"

comments.content:
I'm afraid that FAQ is no longer maintained.
I'll give this bug a few days, to give Lucene developers to speak up, but if
nobody speaks up, I'll close it.
Use the FAQ at jGuru, please.
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic

comments.content:
I am the original author of the FAQ and am still considered to be 
the 'maintainer' but could not allocate time for it in the last two years or 
so. Using the JGuru FAQ is a good idea. If JGuru see any value in any of the 
content in âmyâ FAQ, they can use it feely.
comments.author: Tal Dayan
